content.raw:
Hi there, this is my first time posting on a bit bucket repo. Feel free to point me in the right direction if there is a better place to post this…

I am also having this problem, but I am not using catkin. I am trying to compile Gazebo 10.1 on Ubuntu Xenial \(16.04\). I am stuck, I would really like to see this compile…

To compile Gazebo, I have followed the instructions here: [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install\_from\_source](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_from_source)

First I tried to use the latest release of dart \(v6.9.2\) then I realized that this was a new release, and it seemed like this bug may have shown up after one of the recent updates to DART, so I removed the version of Dart that was installed and instead compiled/installed Dart 6.8.2. To compile Dart, I have followed the instructions here: [http://dartsim.github.io/install\_dart\_on\_ubuntu.html#build-and-install-dart](http://dartsim.github.io/install_dart_on_ubuntu.html#build-and-install-dart)

output of cmake: [https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/aaa178c7d08dc8ef2889d758bf9feb57](https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/aaa178c7d08dc8ef2889d758bf9feb57)

output of make: [https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/fe4c85ed11beb56d4e4cced544e7e471](https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/fe4c85ed11beb56d4e4cced544e7e471)

output of grep: [https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/5ece16e64ad966eea5a10bc01c025972](https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/5ece16e64ad966eea5a10bc01c025972)

Here is the file that seems to be causing the error \(/src/Gazebo/build/deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo\_dir.ode/link.txt\): [https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/25a6ba8538b16535bd0a853e3e39c8f2](https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/25a6ba8538b16535bd0a853e3e39c8f2)

‌

Here is the exact error:

/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -ltinyxml2::tinyxml2  
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status  
make\[2\]: \*\*\* \[deps/opende/libgazebo\_ode.so.10.1.0\] Error 1  
make\[1\]: \*\*\* \[deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo\_ode.dir/all\] Error 2  
make\[1\]: \*\*\* Waiting for unfinished jobs....  
make: \*\*\* \[all\] Error 2
content.html:
Hi there, this is my first time posting on a bit bucket repo. Feel free to point me in the right direction if there is a better place to post this…

I am also having this problem, but I am not using catkin. I am trying to compile Gazebo 10.1 on Ubuntu Xenial (16.04). I am stuck, I would really like to see this compile…

To compile Gazebo, I have followed the instructions here: http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_from_source

First I tried to use the latest release of dart (v6.9.2) then I realized that this was a new release, and it seemed like this bug may have shown up after one of the recent updates to DART, so I removed the version of Dart that was installed and instead compiled/installed Dart 6.8.2. To compile Dart, I have followed the instructions here: http://dartsim.github.io/install_dart_on_ubuntu.html#build-and-install-dart

output of cmake: https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/aaa178c7d08dc8ef2889d758bf9feb57

output of make: https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/fe4c85ed11beb56d4e4cced544e7e471

output of grep: https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/5ece16e64ad966eea5a10bc01c025972

Here is the file that seems to be causing the error (/src/Gazebo/build/deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo_dir.ode/link.txt): https://gist.github.com/josiahblaisdell/25a6ba8538b16535bd0a853e3e39c8f2

‌

Here is the exact error:

/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -ltinyxml2::tinyxml2
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [deps/opende/libgazebo_ode.so.10.1.0] Error 1
make[1]: *** [deps/opende/CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make: *** [all] Error 2
